system.description:
You have learned to ride the falling edge of your wrath as well as its rise, meting out judgment both hot and cold. You gain the following benefits:

  • When your rage ends, you regain a number of spent hit points in your Lay on Hands pool equal to your proficiency bonus. (Any excess beyond your pool maximum is lost.)

  • If you are blinded or deafened, you may still use your Danger Sense, but must spend a use of your Divine Sense to do so.

  • When you convert a spell slot into exertion points, if you have one or more uses of Rage remaining, you are healed for a number of hit points equal to the level of the converted spell slot.

  • While you are raging, your melee weapon attacks deal an additional 1d8 radiant damage.
